title: Kovářův syn
content:
Kovář z vísky Bahnice doesn't live alone, nor is he the only merchant. On a jeho žena se synem who also trades in zbraně, zbroje and related products as part of the family business. The boy doesn't seem really into doing it, but he has to obey his father's wishes, apparently "or else!". The lad can be found next to the his father's shop, looking forlorn. Like most teenagers, he seems to get up relatively late as well.

Rodinné album
